name: Regs-cipe Cookbook
description: A small community for home chefs sharing their best recipes, built with NodeJS

MONGODB_URI.description: An URI to connect to your database

SESSION_SECRET.description: A secret used to sign the session ID cookie

CLOUDINARY_NAME.description: The name of your Cloudinary account. Used to build the public URL for all your media assets

CLOUDINARY_API_KEY.description: Used together with the API secret to communicate with the Cloudinary API and sign requests

CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET.description: Used together with the API key to communicate with the Cloudinary API and sign requests
